text: is a fictional character in the manga series Kaguya-sama: Love Is War. She is the student council secretary of Shuchiin Academy. She comes from a family of politicians. Chika works with vice president Kaguya Shinomiya and president Miyuki Shirogane. She has an innocent and cheerful attitude. Chika does not see the psychological "battles" between Kaguya and Miyuki as they try to make each other confess their love. ==References== == Other websites == * Chika Fujiwara character profile at Kaguya-sama: Love Is War anime official website Category:Anime characters Category:Fictional characters introduced in 2015 Category:Fictional Japanese people
title: Chika Fujiwara
